name: Taskty, Inc.
description: Operator of an online marketplace intended to book service providers for home services. The company's marketplace allows users to connect with housekeeping personels who offer household services, such as home hygiene, furniture washing, pest control, plumbing, carpentry, electricity, air conditioning, and more, enabling customers to choose from a wide range of services as per their budget.
one_liner: Operator of an online marketplace intended to book service providers for home services. The company's marketplace allows users to connect with housekeeping personels who offer household services, such as home hygiene, furniture washing, pest control, plumbing, carpentry, electricity, air conditioning, and more, enabling customers to choose from a wide range of services as per their budget.
